mapper.select: /* [authLoginService.searchUserList] 유저리스트 [juliet61008/25.12.11]*/ with wt_user_relation_mine as ( select b1.user_no , b1.relation_user_no , b1.alias_nm from tbo_user_relation where user_no = #{userNo} ) select a1.user_no , a1.id , a1.name , b1.alias_nm from tbo_user a1 left join wt_user_relation_mine b1 on a1.user_no = b1.relation_user_no where a1.secn_yn = 'N' /* 탈퇴여부 */ and a1.public_relation_yn = 'Y' /* 공개여부 */ and a1.user_no <> #{userNo}
